refnamediv.refpurpose: Rivendell List Cuts C Library Function

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: RD_ListCuts is the function to use to list the cuts that exist in a Rivendell Database Cart entry.
This function lists the fields in the pre-existing cut(s).

row.entry: Memory location to store cut information
memory location for number of records returned

refsect1.para: When successful function will return the number of records sent (numrecs) and a rd_cut structure which is stored in the provided memory locations. The rd_cut structure has the following fields:

refsect2.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect2.para: On success, zero is returned. Using the provided parameters an rd_cut structure is returned and the number of records is returned.
If a server error occurs a -1 is returned. If a client error occurs a specific error number is returned.
